TunableList.name: ALWAYS_ATTRACTIVE_TRAITS
TunableList.description: Traits corresponding to Sims that are always attractive, e.g. the Grim Reaper.

Tunable.description: Any Sim with the specified trait will be always attractive.

Tunable.name: ENABLE_AUTOGENERATION_SAME_SEX_PREFERENCE_THRESHOLD
Tunable.display: Enable Autogeneration Same Sex Preference Threshold
Tunable.description: A value that, once crossed, indicates the player's allowance of same- sex relationships with townie auto-generation.

TunableList.name: ENABLED_AUTOGENERATION_EXPLORING_SEXUALITY_WEIGHTS
TunableList.description: An alternative weightings list for the weighted random choice of sexuality exploration after a romantic same-sex relationship has been kindled.

TunableTuple.description: A mapping between whether we're exploring sexuality and the desired weight.

TunableEnum.name: exploring_sexuality
TunableEnum.description: Whether Sim should be exploring or not exploring their sexuality.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The weight to denote the percentage of NPCs we want to exist with this trait.

TunableList.name: ENABLED_AUTOGENERATION_SAME_SEX_PREFERENCE_WEIGHTS
TunableList.display: Enabled Autogeneration Same Sex Preference Weights
TunableList.description: An alternative weightings mapping for the weighted random chance of sexual attraction after a romantic same-sex relationship has been kindled.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The gender to index the AttractionStatus list to.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: A weightings list for the weighted random choice of sexual attraction.

TunableTuple.description: A mapping between whether we're attracted to this gender and the desired weight.

TunableEnum.name: attraction_status
TunableEnum.description: Whether the Sim is attracted to this gender or not.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The weight to denote the percentage of NPCs we want to exist with this sexual attraction.

TunableList.name: EXPLORING_SEXUALITY_TRAITS_MAPPING
TunableList.description: A mapping between the exploring enum to expected traits for easy lookup.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: Whether Sim should be exploring or not exploring their sexuality.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The matching trait representative of exploring or not exploring sexuality.

TunableList.name: EXPLORING_SEXUALITY_WEIGHTS
TunableList.description: A weightings list for the weighted random choice of exploring sexuality.

TunableEnum.name: exploring_sexuality
TunableEnum.description: Whether Sim should be exploring or not exploring their sexuality.

Tunable.name: weight

Tunable.name: FEMALE_CLOTHING_PREFERENCE_TRAIT
Tunable.description: The trait that signifies that this sim prefers to wear female clothing.

TunableList.name: GENDER_PREFERENCE
TunableList.description: A mapping between gender and the gender preference statistic for easy lookup.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The gender to index the gender preference to.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The statistic that represents the matching gender preference.

Tunable.name: GENDER_PREFERENCE_THRESHOLD
Tunable.description: The threshold in which this sim will consider having an appropriate gender preference. Note that being GREATER THAN OR EQUAL TO this threshold will indicate the Sim has an attraction to the respective gender and will have the appropriate attraction trait, whereas LESS THAN will indicate the opposite (that they have the NotAttracted trait).

TunableList.name: GENDER_PREFERENCE_WEIGHTS
TunableList.description: A mapping between gender and the weighted random chance of sexual attraction to that gender.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The gender to index the AttractionStatus list to.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: A weightings list for the weighted random choice of sexual attraction.

TunableTuple.description: A mapping between whether we're attracted to this gender and the desired weight.

TunableEnum.name: attraction_status
TunableEnum.description: Whether the Sim is attracted to this gender or not.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The weight to denote the percentage of NPCs we want to exist with this sexual attraction.

TunableList.name: GENDERED_CLOTHING_PREFERENCE_TAGS

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The Clothing Preference Gender related to the provided tag (not necessarily the gender of the Sim.)

Tunable.name: MALE_CLOTHING_PREFERENCE_TRAIT
Tunable.description: The trait that signifies that this sim prefers to wear male clothing.
